action.action-desc: Mr. Levin of Michigan (for himself, Mr. Johnson of Georgia, Mr. Jones, Ms. Norton, Mr. Pocan, Ms. Titus, Ms. Tlaib, and Mr. Van Drew) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Labor

form.official-title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to remove the overtime wages exemption for certain employees, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Guaranteeing Overtime for Truckers Act.

section.header: Amendment to the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938
section.text: Section 13(b) of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 (29 U.S.C. 213(b)) is amended by striking paragraph (1).
